sentences.sentence: Batman may win every hand, but equity investors should still fear the Joker.
sentences.translation: 《蝙蝠侠》可能战无不胜，但股权投资者仍应提防着《小丑》。

sentences.sentence: If you're investing with a long time horizon, having an equity bias makes sense, stocks go up in the long run.
sentences.translation: 如果你进行长线投资，存在股权偏好是合理的，那么从长期看，股票是上涨的。

sentences.sentence: One school thinks that, even in cases of negative equity, most homeowners will not default if they can afford the payments.
sentences.translation: 一学派认为，即使在负权益的情况下，如果可以负担还款，大部分房主将不会违约。
